ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Throwdown goes on his first mission as a Joe as the team returns to Olliestan, this time on a mission with two tanks. Roadblock is put in charge of monitoring Serpentor as they attempt to weaponize him as his fellow Joes collectively judged Roadblock the most ethical of them all. Raymond arrives in Japan for training from Storm Shadow.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:20:57. [Issue ID 1310259]
